Summary: about a half a second...a quick light flashed forward
divs: Sighting DetailsMy grandma and I saw this light while driving north down 7th Ave. It was an extremely quick light. I know it was too close to be a shooting star or anything. It kind of reminded me of Star Wars, where the spacecraft suddenly goes at the speed of light. It just vanished.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around August 8th 2007
